revised_title: Investigations on the Reflexion of Polarized Light from Polished Surfaces and Metallic Substances
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the reflection of polarized light from polished surfaces and metallic substances. They used various methods to determine the optical constants and coefficients of reflection and refraction for different materials. The author also investigated the form of the reflected ellipse under varying conditions of incidence and azimuth, providing valuable insights into the properties of light and materials.
